<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Perfection Seeker](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=93)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 82 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

**Region** Impossible Lands

</column>

You aspire to perfect your body and mind in the tradition of Jalmeray’s Houses of Perfection, honing your acrobatic skills and mental faculties in preparation for a lifetime pushing the edge of what most consider possible.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Dexterity
or Wisdom, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) skill, and the [Warfare Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Cat Fall](/Feats.aspx?ID=765) skill feat.
